name: Safari Snap VR
description:
Safari Snap VR

Take a tour around four different habitats to learn about a wide range of animals and capture photos for your album.

Instructions
1) Hold the camera to your face and pull the trigger to take photos.
2) You can press the primary or secondary buttons on your controllers to view the photos you’ve taken at any time.

Wear headphones for the best experience.

Tested on Oculus Quest 1
